body.p: “Very heavy rain all yesterday afternoon “,” and to-day it is somewhat cooler and clearer and the wind more northwesterly “,” and I see the unusual sight of ripples or waves curving up-stream off Cardinal Shore “,” so that the river might seem to be flowing that way. The mountains are of a darker blue.”
PE 14, pg. 155-156/ 9 July 1858-9 November 1858 / NNPM MA 1302:33 / T vol. # XXVII / PDF # XVII / JXI
